B_BACK: Press  to go back to the game.
DECK_ALREADY_EMPTY: The Card Deck is already empty...
DEVKITPRO: - For devkitARM, Libctru, Citro2D and Citro3D.
ENTER_PLAYERAMOUNT:
Enter the Playeramount.
2 - 6 Players are the most allowed amount.
EXIT_GAME_PRMPT: Would you like to exit the game?
GAME_INSTR:
Press  to play.
Press  to draw a card.
Press  to end your round.
Press  |  to switch the card pages.
Use the D-Pad to navigate through the cards.
Press START to show the sub menu.
GAME_PRMPT_1:
You must at least play a card
or draw up to 3 cards, if you can't play!
LOAD_FROM_FILE_PROMPT: Would you like to load your last saved game?
NEXT_PLAYER:
Player %i has finished their round.
Player %i is on the row!
NEW_GAME_PRMPT:
Would you like to start a new game?
You will lose all your current progress.
NOT_VALID_GAME: This is not a valid game.
ONLY_3_CARDS: You can only draw up to 3 cards!
PLAY_AGAINST_COMPUTER: Would you like to play against an computer?
PLAYERAMOUNT_PRMPT:
If you change the Player amount
the game will be fully restarted.
That means you will lose all your progress.
Do you like to continue?
RULES_INSTR:
The rules of this game are the following:

First of all, you need to play an 11, if one exist.
After it, you can play any other card.

You can play as many cards as possible.
But you can also only play one card
to block other players, which may have a higher or lower number.

You need to play at least one card.. if you can't
you need to draw up to 3 cards.
SAVE_TO_FILE_PROMPT: Would you like to save your current game?
